name: Ryzen 7 7800X3D
description: An 8-core, 16-thread processor with a base Clock Speed: 4.2GHz Up to 5.0GHz, perfect for high-performance gaming and multitasking.

name: Asus Dual 4070
description: A powerful graphics card with 8GB GDDR6 memory, capable of ray tracing and running the latest AAA games at high settings.

name: ROG STRIX B650E-I GAMING WIFI
description: A premium ITX motherboard with PCIe 4.0, Wi-Fi 6, and support for AMD Gen 5 CPUs, ideal for gamers and creators.

name: G.Skill flare X5 16GB DDR5
description: High-performance DDR5 memory with a clock speed of 6000MHz, optimized for both Intel and AMD platforms.

name: Seagate FireCuda 530 1TB
description: An ultra-fast NVMe SSD with read speeds up to 7000MB/s, providing quick access to games and applications.

name: Corsair sf750w
description: A 750W 80+ Gold certified power supply, offering efficient power delivery with semi-modular cabling for easy installation.

name: Meshroom D
description: A sleek mid-tower case with a tempered glass front panel, RGB lighting, and excellent cable management features.

name: Noctua NH-L9i
description: An air cooler with a 120mm RGB fan and four heat pipes, offering efficient cooling for high-performance CPUs.
